title: Enforcement Actions Drop 60%: Putin's Graduate Education in American Shock Thera
summary: Internal agency data reveals dramatic decline in enforcement actions related to Putin's Graduate Education in American Shock Therapy (1993-1999). New leadership implements 'industry-friendly' approach, reducing penalties and settlement amounts while increasing industry consultation in rule-making processes.

sources.title: SEC Enforcement Actions Drop in Fiscal Year 2024
sources.description: Official report documenting 12% decline in SEC enforcement actions with detailed statistical analysis

sources.title: Enforcement Trends: Reading Between the Fines
sources.description: Comprehensive overview of regulatory enforcement trends and industry consultation practices
